verses.verse: And the men<WH582> of Kirjathjearim<WH7157> came<WH935>, and fetched up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of the LORD<WH3068>, and brought<WH935> it into the house<WH1004> of Abinadab<WH41> in the hill<WH1389>, and sanctified<WH6942> Eleazar<WH499> his son<WH1121> to keep<WH8104> the ark<WH727> of the LORD<WH3068>.

And it came to pass, while<WH3117> the ark<WH727> abode<WH3427> in Kirjathjearim<WH7157>, that the time<WH3117> was long<WH7235>; for it was twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141>: and all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> lamented<WH5091> after<WH310> the LORD<WH3068>.

And Samuel<WH8050> spake<WH559> unto all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, If ye do return<WH7725> unto the LORD<WH3068> with all your hearts<WH3824>, then put away<WH5493> the strange<WH5236> gods<WH430> and Ashtaroth<WH6252> from among<WH8432> you, and prepare<WH3559> your hearts<WH3824> unto the LORD<WH3068>, and serve<WH5647> him only: and he will deliver<WH5337> you out of the hand<WH3027> of the Philistines<WH6430>.
Then the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did put away<WH5493> Baalim<WH1168> and Ashtaroth<WH6252>, and served<WH5647> the LORD<WH3068> only.
And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559>, Gather<WH6908> all Israel<WH3478> to Mizpeh<WH4708>, and I will pray<WH6419> for you unto the LORD<WH3068>.

And they gathered together<WH6908> to Mizpeh<WH4709>, and drew<WH7579> water<WH4325>, and poured it out<WH8210> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068>, and fasted<WH6684> on that day<WH3117>, and said<WH559> there, We have sinned<WH2398> against the LORD<WH3068>. And Samuel<WH8050> judged<WH8199> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> in Mizpeh<WH4708>.

And when the Philistines<WH6430> heard<WH8085> that the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were gathered together<WH6908> to Mizpeh<WH4708>, the lords<WH5633> of the Philistines<WH6430> went up<WH5927> against Israel<WH3478>. And when the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> heard<WH8085> it, they were afraid<WH3372> of<WH6440> the Philistines<WH6430>.

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> to Samuel<WH8050>, Cease<WH2790> not to cry<WH2199> unto the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> for us, that he will save<WH3467> us out of the hand<WH3027> of the Philistines<WH6430>. Cease: Heb. Be not silent from us from crying

And Samuel<WH8050> took<WH3947> a<WH259> sucking<WH2461> lamb<WH2924>, and offered<WH5927> it for a burnt offering<WH5930> wholly<WH3632> unto the LORD<WH3068>: and Samuel<WH8050> cried<WH2199> unto the LORD<WH3068> for Israel<WH3478>; and the LORD<WH3068> heard<WH6030> him. heard: or, answered

And as Samuel<WH8050> was offering up<WH5927> the burnt offering<WH5930>, the Philistines<WH6430> drew near<WH5066> to battle<WH4421> against Israel<WH3478>: but the LORD<WH3068> thundered<WH7481> with a great<WH1419> thunder<WH6963> on that day<WH3117> upon the Philistines<WH6430>, and discomfited<WH2000> them; and they were smitten<WH5062> before<WH6440> Israel<WH3478>.
And the men<WH582> of Israel<WH3478> went out<WH3318> of Mizpeh<WH4709>, and pursued<WH7291> the Philistines<WH6430>, and smote<WH5221> them, until they came under Bethcar<WH1033>.

Then Samuel<WH8050> took<WH3947> a<WH259> stone<WH68>, and set<WH7760> it between Mizpeh<WH4709> and Shen<WH8129>, and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of it Ebenezer<WH72>, saying<WH559>, Hitherto hath the LORD<WH3068> helped<WH5826> us. Ebenezer: that is, The stone of help

So the Philistines<WH6430> were subdued<WH3665>, and they came<WH935> no more<WH3254> into the coast<WH1366> of Israel<WH3478>: and the hand<WH3027> of the LORD<WH3068> was against the Philistines<WH6430> all the days<WH3117> of Samuel<WH8050>.

And the cities<WH5892> which the Philistines<WH6430> had taken<WH3947> from Israel<WH3478> were restored<WH7725> to Israel<WH3478>, from Ekron<WH6138> even unto Gath<WH1661>; and the coasts<WH1366> thereof did Israel<WH3478> deliver<WH5337> out of the hands<WH3027> of the Philistines<WH6430>. And there was peace<WH7965> between Israel<WH3478> and the Amorites<WH567>.
And Samuel<WH8050> judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> all the days<WH3117> of his life<WH2416>.

And he went<WH1980> from<WH1767> year<WH8141> to year<WH8141> in circuit<WH5437> to Bethel<WH1008>, and Gilgal<WH1537>, and Mizpeh<WH4709>, and judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> in all those places<WH4725>. in circuit: Heb. and he circuited
And his return<WH8666> was to Ramah<WH7414>; for there was his house<WH1004>; and there he judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478>; and there he built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> unto the LORD<WH3068>.
